26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_pci_nv04.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:34 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31static u32
32nv04_pci_rd32(struct nvkm_pci *pci, u16 addr)
33{
34 struct nvkm_device *device = pci->subdev.device;
35 return nvkm_rd32(device, 0x001800 + addr);
36}
37
38static void
39nv04_pci_wr08(struct nvkm_pci *pci, u16 addr, u8 data)
40{
41 struct nvkm_device *device = pci->subdev.device;
42 nvkm_wr08(device, 0x001800 + addr, data);
43}
44
45static void
46nv04_pci_wr32(struct nvkm_pci *pci, u16 addr, u32 data)
47{
48 struct nvkm_device *device = pci->subdev.device;
49 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x001800 + addr, data);
50}
51
52static const struct nvkm_pci_func
53nv04_pci_func = {
54 .rd32 = nv04_pci_rd32,
55 .wr08 = nv04_pci_wr08,
56 .wr32 = nv04_pci_wr32,
57};
58
59int
60nv04_pci_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_pci **ppci)
61{
62 return nvkm_pci_new_(&nv04_pci_func, device, index, ppci);
63}
64
